Take I-5 or State Route 99 toward Sacramento and exit on Eight Mile Road, north of Stockton.  Drive east to the junction of Eight Mile and State Route 88, turn left (north).  Just a mile east of Clements, take the SR 88 split north (left).

J. Monteverde General Store - 3 Randolph St., Sutter Creek.  A 1900s-style general store with vintage goods displayed. 

Sutter Creek Visitor Center - 11A Randolph St., Sutter Creek.  209-267-1344.  Open weekends 10-3. 

Placerville Hardware - the oldest continuously operated hardware store in California; serves breakfast and lunch.

Sutter Creek Palace - 76 Main St., Sutter Creek, 209-267-1300

Susan's Place Wine Bar & Eatery - 15 Eureka St., Sutter Creek, 209-267-0945

Imperial Hotel Restaurant - Highway 49, Amador City, 209-267-9172

Taste Restaurant - Downtown Plymouth, 209-245-DINE

Amador Foothill Winery - 12500 Steiner Road, Plymouth, 209-245-6307.  Very good view, but an unattractive tasting room.  

Montevina - 20680 Shenandoah School Rd., Plymouth, CA  95669, (209) 245-6942.  Very pleasant tasting experience.  Large tasting room with some shopping and food samples.  

Renwood - 12225 Steiner Rd., Plymouth, (209) 245-6979.  Large tasting room with plenty of shopping.  Pleasant grounds though not a huge view.

The Foxes Inn of Sutter Creek - 77 Main Street, Sutter Creek, 209-267-5882.  Victorian bed and breakfast.

St. George Hotel - Main Street, Volcano, CA, 209-296-4458
